mapper.insert: INSERT INTO midGoal ( midGoalCode , finalGoalCode , biggestGoalCode , goalTotalCode , memberCode , managerCode , managerGradeCode , midGoalName , studyCode , lisenceListCode , midGoalPlan , midGoalStart , midGoalEnd , midGoalBudget , midGoalDate )VALUE( #{midGoalCode}, #{finalGoalCode}, #{biggestGoalCode}, #{goalTotalCode}, #{memberCode}, #{managerCode}, #{managerGradeCode}, #{midGoalName}, #{studyCode}, #{lisenceListCode}, #{midGoalPlan}, #{midGoalStart}, #{midGoalEnd}, #{midGoalBudget}, now())
